questions.question: What is DAX in Power BI?
questions.explanation: DAX stands for Data Analysis Expressions, a formula language used in Power BI for data modeling.

questions.question: What is Power Query?

options.A: A data connection technology that enables you to discover, connect, combine, and refine data across a wide variety of sources.

questions.explanation: Power Query is a data connection technology that enables you to discover, connect, combine, and refine data across a wide variety of sources.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Desktop?
questions.explanation: Power BI Desktop is used to create reports and dashboards, providing a comprehensive environment for data analysis and visualization.

questions.question: What is the Power BI service?

options.A: A cloud-based service that allows you to share and collaborate on reports and dashboards.

questions.explanation: The Power BI service is a cloud-based service that allows you to share and collaborate on reports and dashboards, enabling real-time data access and collaboration.

questions.question: What is Power BI Report Server?

options.A: An on-premises report server where you can publish your Power BI reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Report Server is an on-premises report server where you can publish your Power BI reports, providing a secure environment for data sharing.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Mobile?

options.A: To access and interact with Power BI reports and dashboards on mobile devices.

questions.explanation: Power BI Mobile allows you to access and interact with Power BI reports and dashboards on mobile devices, providing flexibility and mobility in data analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Embedded?

options.A: To embed Power BI reports and dashboards into applications.

questions.explanation: Power BI Embedded allows you to embed Power BI reports and dashboards into applications, providing seamless integration and enhanced user experience.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Gateway?

options.A: To connect on-premises data sources to Power BI.

questions.explanation: Power BI Gateway connects on-premises data sources to Power BI, enabling secure and reliable data access.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI API?

options.A: To programmatically interact with Power BI service.

questions.explanation: Power BI API allows you to programmatically interact with Power BI service, providing automation and integration capabilities.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Visuals?

options.A: To create custom visualizations in Power BI.

questions.explanation: Power BI Visuals allow you to create custom visualizations in Power BI, providing flexibility and creativity in data presentation.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Templates?

options.A: To create reusable report templates in Power BI.

questions.explanation: Power BI Templates allow you to create reusable report templates in Power BI, providing consistency and efficiency in report creation.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Themes?

options.A: To apply consistent styling to Power BI reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Themes allow you to apply consistent styling to Power BI reports, providing a cohesive and professional appearance.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Bookmarks?

options.A: To save and share specific views of Power BI reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Bookmarks allow you to save and share specific views of Power BI reports, providing quick access to important insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Q&A?

options.A: To interact with Power BI reports using natural language queries.

questions.explanation: Power BI Q&A allows you to interact with Power BI reports using natural language queries, providing intuitive and accessible data exploration.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Alerts?

options.A: To notify users of important changes in Power BI reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Alerts notify users of important changes in Power BI reports, providing timely and relevant information.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Subscriptions?

options.A: To automatically send Power BI reports to users on a regular basis.

questions.explanation: Power BI Subscriptions automatically send Power BI reports to users on a regular basis, providing consistent and reliable access to insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Workspaces?

options.A: To organize and collaborate on Power BI content.

questions.explanation: Power BI Workspaces organize and collaborate on Power BI content, providing a structured and collaborative environment for data analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Dataflows?

options.A: To create and manage data transformation processes in Power BI.

questions.explanation: Power BI Dataflows create and manage data transformation processes in Power BI, providing efficient and scalable data management.
